full_text:
Re: Epstein
From Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
To Ray Ormond
Date 2019/07/26 09:09
Subject: Re: Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm

Good Morning,

Inmate Epstein was assessed by Psychologist services and it has been determined he will remain on Psychological Observation over the weekend and he will be assessed on Monday.

*A Psychologist will assess him each day on the weekend*. Thanks.

Shirley Skipper-Scott
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
Office: 646-836[redacted]
Black Berry: 646-423[redacted]
[redacted]@bop.gov

>>> Ray Ormond 7/24/2019 12:16 PM >>>
Thanks Shirley.

J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director
Northeast Region
215-521[redacted]

>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 7/24/2019 12:14 PM >>>
Hello,

Epstein is pending a Code 228, Tattooing or Self-Mutilation and I spoke with [redacted] who indicated that most likely he will be found competent because he is not mentally ill [redacted]. Therefore, he will be pending a UDC hearing. Should he return to SHU, he will be housed with inmate [redacted] is a 54-year-old White Male. He is a Pretrial inmate on a Supervised Release Violation for Failure to Register as Sex Offender. He is refusing to go to general population.

The other inmates in SHU were reviewed for a possible cell mate, however, inmate [redacted] were determined the appropriate candidates as cell mates. However, [redacted] releases on July 26, 2019. He is also the current cell mate of inmate [redacted].

We are still reviewing cases in the general population for a possible cell mate.

Page 541
DOJ-OGR-00027261
